name: Battle Bond
description: The Pokemon forges a strong bond with those who face the fiercest battles. After a victory, a surge of power surfaces thanks to their friendship.
effect: If a foe faints the same Round that they were dealt direct damage by the User, the User may Increase 1 Point to its Strength, Dexterity or Special Attribute. Each option may only be chosen once, and these stat increases persist between scenes. This Ability cannot be copied, replaced or suppressed (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Gastro Acid, Trace etc.)
